about_the_game:
Waste Walkers

The Survivor Pack DLC lets you start off with some useful extra items to help you in your journey!
Survivor Pack DLC:
  • 1x Hatchet (weapon)
  • 1x Sawed Off Double Barrel Shotgun (weapon)
  • 10x 12 Gauge Buckshot (ammunition)
  • 1x Molotov Cocktail (grenade)
  • 1x Leather Jacket (armor)
  • 10x Tabs (money)
  • 3x Water Bottle (drink)
  • 1x MRE (food)
  • 2x Bandages (medical item)
  • 1x Medicated Bandage (medical item)
  • 1x Anti-Radiation Tablet (medical item)

PLEASE NOTE: STARTING A NEW GAME WILL BE REQUIRED TO ACCESS THE ITEMS. THEY ARE GRANTED IMMEDIATELY AFTER CHARACTER CREATION!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
